name: Cave Giant Shaman
description: The Cave Giant Shaman is a gigantic creature with immense physical power and magical abilities, characterized by its chaotic evil nature.
memorable: Its unique ability, Sunlight Petrification, makes it particularly vulnerable when exposed to bright light.
goals: To overpower adventurers and utilize its magical abilities for chaotic purposes.
relations: May be encountered with other giants or dark creatures of the underworld.
environment: Typically found in dark caves or underground lairs.
strengths: High hit points and strong melee attacks make it difficult to defeat, along with powerful spellcasting.
weaknesses: Severely weakened in sunlight, taking radiant damage and suffering from reduced abilities.
attacks: Multiattack with a club and tusks, inflicting bludgeoning and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Capable of casting high-level spells such as disintegrate and cloudkill.
senses: Has darkvision out to 120 feet, allowing it to see in dark environments.
skills: Proficient in athletics and survival, indicating notable physical prowess.
additional_information: Possesses a high Strength score of 27, ensuring powerful melee attacks.
Can cast spells as a 14th-level spellcaster with a focus on area control.
Has a very high Charisma of 21 which enhances its spell potency.
In sunlight, it suffers from significant disadvantages, making it vulnerable.
Uses terrain and magic strategically to control the battlefield.
spellcasting: Can cast a variety of spells, including damaging spells like lightning bolt and utility spells like haste.
